title: Trump Administration Begins Program to Increase Government’s Tech Worker Ranks
description: The U.S. Tech Force is aiming to hire about 1,000 top-level technical employees and supervisors to join federal agencies and work on projects related to artificial intelligence and modernization.

title: Merriam-Webster's Word of 2025 is Artificial Intelligence 'Slop'
description: "It’s part of a transformative technology," M-W's president says.
content:
A variety of words might come to mind in wondering how to sum up this past year.
The editors over at Merriam-Webster, meanwhile, have chosen a rather unique term as its 2025 Word of the Year: “slop.” The company announced its decision on Monday, Dec.... [1475 chars]

title: 25,000 public sector employees will receive bonuses of up to €2,000 this year, based on evaluation using Artificial Intelligence
description: The payments will be made in the first months of 2026 – Beneficiaries were identified using the SMART method and an AI-based evaluation system
content:
The Ministry of Interior is preparing a bonus equivalent to a 13th salary for at least 25,000 public sector employees, as part of the full implementation of the productivity bonus for 2025.

title: The 'one chatbot per child' model for AI in classrooms conflicts with what research shows: Learning is a social process
description: In the Star Trek universe, the audience occasionally gets a glimpse inside schools on the planet Vulcan. Young children stand alone in pods surrounded by 360-degree digital screens. Adults wander among the pods but do not talk to the students. Instead, each child interacts only with a sophisticated artificial intelligence, which peppers them with questions about everything from mathematics to philosophy.

content:

title: Public trust in AI chatbot therapists surges
description: Public attitudes toward 'chatbot therapists' shifted dramatically during the rapid rise of generative artificial intelligence in 2023, according to a new Curtin University study, that is now behind the redevelopment of a safer, well-being chatbot called Monti.

title: AI helps solve decades-old maze in frustrated magnet physics
description: By partnering with artificial intelligence (AI), a researcher at the U.S. Department of Energy's (DOE) Brookhaven National Laboratory has solved a long-standing physics problem and uncovered the mathematical trickery that underlies the generalization of recently discovered, extremely surprising new states of matter. The work exemplifies the paradigm shift that is taking place in research, as scientists learn to see AI as a valuable asset in advancing knowledge and discovery.

title: Merriam-Webster names 'slop' its 2025 word of the year
description: Merriam-Webster defines slop as “digital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence.”
content:
Merriam-Webster has one word for 2025: “slop.”
The American dictionary defines slop as “digital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence.”
